trigger: No smoke alarm present in home
action_item: Install a qualifying smoke alarm on each level of the home, including the basement and outside sleeping areas, per IHWAP and DOE WAP requirements.
documentation: Photo of installed alarms, location notes, and client sign-off in job file.
policy_text: All weatherized homes must have working smoke alarms on every level and outside sleeping areas.

trigger: Existing smoke alarm not functional or not tested
action_item: Replace battery and test alarm. If still not working, replace the alarm. Document the test or replacement before weatherization proceeds.
documentation: Photo of alarm, battery/test documentation, replacement record if needed.
policy_text: All alarms must be tested and confirmed working before and after WX activities.

trigger: Smoke alarm location non-compliant (missing in required areas)
action_item: Install additional alarms in required areas—each level, outside sleeping areas, and as required by local code.
documentation: Photos and home diagram showing alarm locations.
policy_text: Placement of alarms must meet IHWAP/DOE/local code; additional units required if missing.

action_item: Document client refusal with a signed waiver. Notify supervisor and retain documentation in job file. Do not proceed with weatherization until risk is addressed.
documentation: Signed client refusal/waiver form, supervisor notification.
policy_text: Refusal of required H&S measures must be documented and escalated before WX proceeds.
